snippet: As YouTube personalities grow in popularity and prove more than flashes in the pan, traditional media businesses, particularly concert promoters, are rushing to capitalize.
abstract: Traditional media businesses like talent agencies, book publishers and television networks are rushing to capitalize on popularity of YouTube personalities and other social media stars; biggest push has come from concert promoters betting that millions of clicks on popular videos will translate into ticket sales for events like the DigiFest NYC festival in Queens.
lead_paragraph: As YouTube personalities grow in popularity and prove more than flashes in the pan, traditional media businesses, particularly concert promoters, are rushing to capitalize.

headline.main: Performing Without Net: Stars of YouTube Take to the Stage
headline.print_headline: Without Net, YouTube Stars Take to the Stage
